titles.title: Permanent Marriage Penalty Relief Act of 2011
A bill to provide permanent tax relief from the marriage penalty.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S130)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 1/25/2011--Introduced. Permanent Marriage Penalty Relief Act of 2011 - Renders inapplicable the general terminating date (i.e., December 31, 2012) of the Economic Growth and Tax Relief Reconciliation Act of 2001 to provisions of that Act that eliminate the tax effect known as the marriage penalty in the standard tax deduction, the 15% income tax bracket, and the earned income tax credit.
